price: Bazi gusa ibigaragara mu buzima bw’isi, nyamara bakirengagiza ubuzima bw’imperuka.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُونَ ظَٰهِرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamūna ẓāhiran mina al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wahum ʿani al-ākhirati hum ghāfilūna
